      • searchDisjunctiveFacetingAsync

        public <T extends Collection<String>> Request searchDisjunctiveFacetingAsync(@NonNull
                                                                             Query query,
                                                                             @NonNull
                                                                             Collection<String> disjunctiveFacets,
                                                                             @NonNull
                                                                             Map<String,T> refinements,
                                                                             @NonNull
                                                                             CompletionHandler completionHandler)
        Perform a search with disjunctive facets, generating as many queries as number of disjunctive facets.
        Parameters:
        query - The query.
        disjunctiveFacets - List of disjunctive facets.
        refinements - The current refinements, mapping facet names to a list of values.
        completionHandler - The listener that will be notified of the request's outcome.
        Returns:
        A cancellable request.
